abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission is investigating Dow Jones board member David Li over an insider trading case linked to the News Corporation‘s bid for the Wall Street Journal publisher, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: The Securities and Exchange Commission is investigating Dow Jones board member David Li over an insider trading case linked to the News Corporation‘s bid for the Wall Street Journal publisher, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Wednesday.

headline.main: S.E.C. Is Said to Investigate Dow Jones Director
